name: The Gods Give Us Blessed Rain
name_original: The Gods Give Us Blessed Rain
description:
Reimu is sick and tired of the rain. Determined to end her ennui once and for all, she embarks on a journey to either stop the rain or somehow come to enjoy it.

This is Blessed Rain, a small Touhou-fangame visual novel about rain. It was made for Touhou Jam 7.

Please contact me (Bagoum#4773) on Discord for feedback or anything else.

This game was developed using Suzunoya, a visual novel engine, and Danmokou, a bullet hell engine. Please see the license files in the downloadable for licenses.

Controls:
- Confirm/Skip: Z or Enter or left click
- Back: X or right click
- Navigate menus: Arrow keys or mouse
Note that scrolling behavior is currently a bit buggy, so scrolling with the mouse wheel will move EXTREMELY slowly. Please use the arrow keys or the scrollbar on the side instead.
